text: hey everyone this is amazing I've made
to the top eight in the MuchMusic VJ
search two point oh thanks to all the
wonderful support from everybody my fans
my subscribers my friends it's been
amazing but now it's time for me to give
back I have teamed up with the BC SPCA
which is the British Columbia Society
for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals
to help support their cause the BC SPCA
is one of the largest and most
progressive animal welfare organizations
in North America it provides a wide
range of services and programs for
abused injured lost and homeless animals
the BC SPCA provides emergency medical
care and sheltering for over thirty
seven thousand animals each year through
its 41 facilities and operations across
BC the Society also conducts a more than
4,600 cruelty investigations and
provides a wide range of advocacy and
education programs on wild farm and
domestic animals through its provincial
office in vancouver by supporting the BC
SPCA you are helping to improve the
lives of thousands of animals so please
help me in supporting this wonderful
cause so what you can do to help is if
you are in the Greater Vancouver area I
am hosting a little kind of get together
meet and greet i'm calling it Nadine's
SPCA fundraising and birthday event
since it's going to be on a Friday
October thirtieth which is just so
happens to be my 22nd birthday so i will
be at capilano mall between four and
seven p.m. on friday October thirtieth
and there you can say hello and i will
have an SVC a donations booths set up
and you can learn all about this
wonderful cause and of course donate
because that would be amazing and just
